My Portfolio

2018

Talk about file structure (7-11 architecture), first sass project, first learned better git skills working through this project.

Future Plans

I plan to build upon and maintain this new portfolio site as a collection of my work -almost as a personal art gallery as much as it is a portfolio. I enjoy posting about these projects because it makes me revisit the work I did. It also gives me an oppertunity to critique my own work. Long term plan would be to use some sort of template engine to eliminate duplicate head, footer, menu code.
